member.name: M:NiiPrinterCLib.NIIClassLib.NiiGetInformation(System.String,System.Byte,System.Byte[],System.Int64@)
member.summary:
Get the data in which the target Class ID is saved.
*You need to send the demand for target data from the original application to the printer in advance.
(Extended status, Print competion information may not needed in some models)
*Returning value is explained in the <>command chart in the printer specification.
member.param: Update flag(Elapsed time after the system starts)
